XenotypeDef.label: Gauranlen Queen
XenotypeDef.description: Gauranlen Queen are the symbiotic creatures found at the heart of every Gauralen tree. The creatures bond with a tree in their larval form and remain there permanently, eventually reaching maturity and birthing the creatures known across the Rim as Dryads. There are rumours that in extreme times of duress, such as mass deforestation and extreme environmental shifts, these creatures will seek any living host as refuge whilst they grow to maturity.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A parasitic Gauranlen Queen capable of taking a living creature as a host.
